title: Am I supposed to have 15 rune pages?
body:
I have 15 rune pages. um, on my main account, I barely use this one actually.

I dunno how many I originally bought on it, but I think it was slightly less than that, probably more like 9 in total, IDK I don't remember, but perhaps I had fifteen total, w/e

but - am I supposed to have them all? some people seem bitter as if they've lost their extra rune pages. if they have, then I'm hoping their loss is a bug they should be complaining about, and not my surplus being a bug. don't take my pages away :O I like them! 

Or maybe the PBE random amount of pages is accidentally pushed to live, and everyone got a random number of rune pages, and I got lucky. 

Not sure. 

hoping a rioter can give us a reply. Also, anyone who knows for a fact they have fewer rune pages than they used to, mention it here so that I'm not just supposing...

replies.body: Rune pages weren't adjusted with the preseason.  Going to your collection and runes section should show the number of pages you have available to customize.  Keep in mind, though, that it doesn't include the extra presets you're given for free and new players.  If you are unsure about the number of pages you had or feel something might be off, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and offer more context.
